body.p: At the date of initial application, an entity is not required to make adjustments to the previous accounting for its involvement with either:

li.p: entities that would be consolidated at that date in accordance with IAS 27 Consolidated and Separate Financial Statements and SIC‑12 Consolidation—Special Purpose Entities and are still consolidated in accordance with this IFRS; or
entities that would not be consolidated at that date in accordance with IAS 27 and SIC‑12 and are not consolidated in accordance with this IFRS.
